tool_description: Analyzes music usage patterns across platforms and time periods to identify trends, anomalies, and optimization opportunities for royalty collection.

usage_data.description: Array of clean usage record strings

time_granularity.description: Time granularity for trend analysis: hour, day, week, month

anomaly_sensitivity.description: Sensitivity for anomaly detection (0.1-2.0, higher = more sensitive)

error_messages: Data volume exceeded: Maximum 500000 usage records per analysis. Process in batches for larger datasets.
Invalid analysis dimensions: Provide 1-20 valid dimension names for pattern analysis.
Invalid time granularity: Use hour, day, week, or month for time_granularity.
Invalid sensitivity: Anomaly sensitivity must be between 0.1 and 2.0.
usage: Provide usage_data array and analysis_dimensions. Configure time_granularity, seasonal analysis, and anomaly sensitivity based on your analysis needs.

usage_trends.description: Array of identified usage trends and patterns

anomalies_detected.description: Array of usage anomalies that require attention

pattern_insights.description: Summary of key insights and recommendations
